text: Nænxn ying xallxhˌ thrng diyin kha phud khxng brrda phu thi klaw wa thæ cring xallxhˌ nan pen phu yakcn læa phwk rea nan pen phu mangmi rea ca caruk sing thi phwk khea di klaw wi læa kar thi phwk khea kha br rda nabi doy prascak khwam pen thrrm dwy læa rea ca klaw wa phwk cea cng lim kar lngthosʹ hæng pelw pheling theid
